Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state C,$P_{C}=1\times10^{5}P_{a}$ and $V_{C}=5L$
Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state A,$P_{A}=1\times10^{5}P_{a}$ and $V_{A}=2L$
Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state B,$P_{B}=4\times10^{5}P_{a}$ and $V_{B}=2L$
During the cycle, the work done by the outside world on the gas is $W=-(W_{BC}-W_{CA})=-S_{\Delta ABC}=-450\mathrm{J}$
